entry.title: Photos Post 34: Special Events (after 1975), Part 34
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 1 Photo of the special event 1982-0705 Comments, after the Kathak Performance, London, UK has been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the Photo in the smallest gallery: Collection 1982.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 34: Special Events (after 1975), Part 31
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos of the special event 1979-0124 Arrival, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 low resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 2 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1979.
The event has as well 1 photo Moments of Joy which can be seen in the smallest gallery at the link Collection Moments of Joy.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
